title: Red & Wolfe, Part Two
description: Return to Rabbit Island for the erotic second installment of Red & Wolfe, the sensual story of exiled playboy James Wolfe and writer Sarah "Red" Ryder. This is an erotic fairy tale inspired by Little Red Riding Hood. The first installment can be found exclusively in the BEND Anthology, for sale on Amazon.com beginning May 5.
author: Ella James
